name: Gale archer
description:
Gameplay

In this game, you take on the role of an archer whose mission is to defeat hordes of slimes that are invading the kingdom. But there's a catch: the wind is constantly changing, making it difficult for you to aim your shots accurately.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter different types of slimes that have their own unique abilities. You'll need to use your wits and your archery skills to take them all down.

The wind will play a crucial role in your success. You'll need to pay attention to its direction, adjusting your shots accordingly.

To help you out, you'll have access to a range of different upgrades, each with its own unique advantages. Some upgrades may increase arrow's extra damage, while other upgrades may be more suitable for defence.

Controls

- "WASD" player movement

- "Mouse" aiming with bow

- "Mouse left button hold and release" charging and shooting with bow

- "Escape/P" open/close pause menu
